data.title: WPXY Radio Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: How much does it cost to advertise on WPXY-FM. Find radio advertising rates for WPXY-FM in New York.
data.text:
How much does radio advertising cost on WPXY-FM? We've got the information you need!

Why Advertise on WPXY?

WPXY-FM listeners in the Rochester, NY area are waiting to hear from you about your offerings. It is owned by CBS Radio. The radio station format is Top 40/CHR. This station broadcasts at 97.9 FM.

Radio Advertising Rate for WPXY-FM

The estimated ad rate for the radio station is $44.00. Note: Individual radio station rates are not readily available. Our estimates are based on regional averages and may be very inaccurate. Advertising rate estimates are typically for a 30 second spot. Seasonal factors and volume discounts should also be considered. Contact the radio station's advertising department for an exact quote on their current rates. In some cases, our estimated rates may be significantly different from the actual current rates...so be sure to get your ad prices from the station before completing your budgeting.

To buy an ad or to receive more information on radio advertising rates, please contact WPXY-FM at (585) 399-5700.

WPXY-FM Contact Information

WPXY-FM

100 Chestnut St

Ste 1700

Rochester, NY 14604

Phone: (585) 399-5700

Fax: (585) 399-5750

To update or correct radio advertising information on this page, please use the link below:
